title: Bug 104630: Column icons don't show up in connecting Derby database
OB: When connecting a Derby database in the Data Explorer view and creating a dataset with a query, the column icons are not displayed.
EB: The column icons should be displayed correctly when connecting a Derby database and creating a dataset with a query.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Create a new project. 2. Create a new report. 3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source to connect to a Derby database using the following settings: 
 - Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver 
 - Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui 
 - User Name: root 
 - Password: root 
4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset. 5. In the Edit Data Set window, select Query.
